name: Chris Robison
bio: CBob.eth is the founder of meTokens and former Hoard, Golem Foundation, and OMG Network teammate. Chris presented the first ever talk on NFT Utility at ETHBerlin in 2018, and has since spoken at DevCon, NFT.NYC, NIFTY (HGK), the ECFâ€™s Non-Fungible Summit, & more. He acquired punk #4330 in 2018 for 0.15 ETH ($34).
